channel.title: PgBouncer Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in PgBouncer Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Running PgBouncer This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run a PgBouncer. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using kind.
